songs.title: One Way Mirror
songs.lyrics:
[Link x2]
Take me to a better place
Take me to a better place
On the other side
On the other side of life

[Pre-Hook x2]
And I try, try try to meet your perception
And though it sounds good in reflection
Didn't promise to embody perfection

[Hook]
One way mirror
Three wishes I refused to deliver
You see the things I promised to give ya
Abusing my liver
Get closer
The closer you inspect it gets clearer
I can see you but you don't see me
I really need you but you don't need me
You see through it all
You see through the one way mirror
You see the things I promised to give ya
Oh, oh
You see the things I promised to give ya
Three wishes I refused to deliver

[Link]

And I try, try, try to beat the addiction
But that's the only place I got kicks from
You were frosty to me like I was Nixon

[Hook]

Oh, oh
You see the things I promised to give ya
Three wishes I refused to deliver
